#summary Math with Free Software.

= PyLab =

== Plotting CSV ==
Run PyLab:

{{{
$ ipython -pylab
}}}

Open CSV:

{{{
data = csv2rec("hand_results.txt", delimiter=" ")
}}}

Print some data:

{{{
print data
print data["name"]
print data[1]
}}}

Create figure:

{{{
figure()
}}}

Plot a column:

{{{
plot(range(len(data)), data["column1"], "r.")
}}}

Add details:

{{{
xticks(range(len(data)), data["name"],)
grid(".")
ylabel("Y")
xlabel("X")
title("Hello world!")
legend(('Column 1',), loc='best')
}}}

Save figure:

{{{
savefig('figure.pdf')
}}}
